briefTitle: The Effect of Yoga on Barriers to Occupational Engagement in African American Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: The Effect of Yoga on Barriers to Occupational Engagement in African American Breast Cancer Survivors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* African American race
* Breast Cancer survivor
* No medical restrictions on activity

Exclusion Criteria:

* Race other than African American
* No history of breast cancer
* Medical restrictions on activity
